snippet: To the Editor:   I take offense at your focus for 1993. For the first Sunday in the new year, you placed the possibility of death, filled with style, at our feet ("Arming the Armani Set," Jan. 3)....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: I take offense at your focus for 1993. For the first Sunday in the new year, you placed the possibility of death, filled with style, at our feet ("Arming the Armani Set," Jan. 3).
